name: Real Sports Car Hill Racing
description:
Boost speed, Tap race, Drive fast, Go ahead and select your desire flag to win this 3d race.
This gameplay gives you a multiple stunts.
Drive monster car at max speed and collect flag.
Take this flag to the end point or to the top of the mountain to win this race.
Map of city to show your rank in monster race.
You can save your game in mid of the race and can resume when ever you want.
So let's play mini monster car racing to enjoy the thrill of stunts and epic mountain drive.
